text_block_list.text:
――Alright. With this, it looks like 
we're done loading all the luggage.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
――Alright. With this, it looks like 
we're done loading all the luggage.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Very well. ……Well then, Team <Ascella>! 
Is everyone here? We're doing the final checks before departing!
text_block_list.name: King Halo

text_block_list.text:
Okaaa~aay, Team Member #1 is here~. 
All of my luggage has already been loaded~.
text_block_list.name: Antenna-haired Uma Musume

text_block_list.text:
I've also finished! Ah, I brought along a lot 
of snacks, so let's eat them during the ride!
text_block_list.name: Single Knot Uma Musume

text_block_list.text:
Wait, I thought you had more luggage than normal but……Geez. 
……and, how about the two new members? Are you all set?
text_block_list.name: King Halo

text_block_list.text: Yes. Cesario here, no issues.
text_block_list.name: Cesario

text_block_list.text:
Rhein Kraft too! 
I……Um, probably, haven't forgotten anything.
text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft

text_block_list.text:
P-probably haven't? If anything comes up, 
don't hold back and just tell me, okay……?
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
P-probably haven't? If anything comes up, 
don't hold back and just tell me, okay……?
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Right. After all――Kraft-san. 
This expedition is for your sake.
text_block_list.name: King Halo

text_block_list.text:
Alright, we should get going then! 
Everyone, get in the car!
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Alright, we should get going then! 
Everyone, get in the car!
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: And we're off, to Rhein Kraft's 『Hanshin JF』!
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: And we're off, to Rhein Kraft's 『Hanshin JF』!
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: Oooouu!!
text_block_list.name: Team Members

text_block_list.text:
I'm looking forward to it! My first G1…… 
With everyone's support, I'll be sure to make it count!
text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft

text_block_list.text:
And, more importantly, are you feeling okay? 
Did you get enough sleep yesterday? Are those dark 
circles under your eyes just my imagination?
text_block_list.name: King Halo

text_block_list.text:
……Seems like you were so nervous you didn't sleep 
very well. Geez, you're as blockheaded as usual!
text_block_list.name: King Halo

text_block_list.text:
Anyways, to get to the inn near the Hanshin 
Racecourse, it'll take about eight hours, 
including breaks! Make sure you drive properly.
text_block_list.name: King Halo

text_block_list.text:
If you start dozing off, I'll be right beside 
you to pinch your thighs and wake you up.
text_block_list.name: King Halo

text_block_list.text: Ah. I think it's about time to move in to the right-hand lane.
text_block_list.name: King Halo

text_block_list.text:
Yeah, yeah, stay focused. ……That said, before 
we knew it, everyone's already asleep. I 
suppose they all didn't get much sleep either.
text_block_list.name: King Halo
choice_data_list: It's fine if you sleep too
It's fine if you sleep too

text_block_list.text:
I'm awake to keep watch over you, dummy. There's a lot 
riding on this you know, so it's a big responsibility.
text_block_list.name: King Halo

text_block_list.text:
……Really, we've gotten quite a few new members, 
haven't we? Did you ever imagine that we'd be 
able to fill up this van so quickly?
text_block_list.name: King Halo

text_block_list.text:
Probably not. ……when my dad was the 
Trainer, this car wasn't enough though――
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Probably not. ……when my dad was the 
Trainer, this car wasn't enough though――
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
<username>. From now on, I'm leaving the Trainer role 
of Team <Ascella> to you. ……Understood? Do it properly.
text_block_list.name: Father

text_block_list.text:
Since I took over the team, the number of members 
has decreased, huh? Now that I think about it, 
there was a time when it was just the two of us……
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Since I took over the team, the number of members 
has decreased, huh? Now that I think about it, 
there was a time when it was just the two of us……
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Now that you mention it, there was. ……It's a bit nostalgic. 
And now it's grown this much――
text_block_list.name: King Halo

text_block_list.text:
On top of that, even two promising rookies that can handle G1 races 
joined. ……It's shaping up to be quite the team, don't you think?
text_block_list.name: King Halo

text_block_list.text:
Rhein Kraft and Cesario have both breathed new 
life in to Team <Ascella>. The first time meeting 
both of them is still vivid in my memory――
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Rhein Kraft and Cesario have both breathed new 
life in to Team <Ascella>. The first time meeting 
both of them is still vivid in my memory――
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Now, all the Uma Musume have entered their gates. 
Each Uma Musume is eager to show off their strength 
in order to be scouted by a trainer――
text_block_list.name: Live Announcer

text_block_list.text: Preparations are complete. Now, the Selection race starts!!
text_block_list.name: Live Announcer

text_block_list.text: Yaa……!!
text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft

text_block_list.text:
And quickly getting in to a good position is Rhein Kraft! 
She's off to an outstanding start!
text_block_list.name: Live Announcer

text_block_list.text:
Uooooh, as expected! She's giving us a good show 
right from the start~……! Just like was mentioned, 
Rhein Kraft has some considerable abilities!
text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
(To be able to accelerate up to full speed that quickly…… 
she has quite the talent when it comes to speed!)
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
(To be able to accelerate up to full speed that quickly…… 
she has quite the talent when it comes to speed!)
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
(Able to concentrate and avoid a late start, able to judge the 
best position to take……it was quite the eye-opening potential……!)
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Haa, haa, haa……! 
I can still keep going……like this……!!
text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft

text_block_list.text:
Alright, she seems to be regulating her pace well! Like that, 
don't you think Rhein Kraft might just win outright!?
text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
……No, it doesn't look like it. 
After all, look, now that they've entered the latter half――!!
text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer A

text_block_list.text: ――Fuuu……!!
text_block_list.name: Cesario

text_block_list.text:
With 400m left, here comes Cesario! Cesario with the speed!! 
She breaks through the group from behind and quickly pulls away!!
text_block_list.name: Live Announcer

text_block_list.text:
What terrifying speed! She easily pulls away 
from the other Uma Musume! Cesario, with that 
burst, quickly approaches Rhein Kraft in the lead!!
text_block_list.name: Live Announcer

text_block_list.text:
(She must have been preserving her strength, 
but look at that form! She didn't just stand 
out……she was on a completely different level!!!)
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: Haaaaaaaaaa!!
text_block_list.name: Cesario

text_block_list.text:
! So you've made it, like I thought……! 
But! Yaaaaaaaaaー!!
text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft

text_block_list.text:
(She caught back up……! Will Cesario continue on just like this!? 
No, Rhein Kraft shows no signs of giving up just yet!)
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
(She caught back up……! Will Cesario continue on just like this!? 
No, Rhein Kraft shows no signs of giving up just yet!)
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
(The other girls can't keep up at all! 
Those two……it's become a one-on-one battle……!!)
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: Aaaaaaaaaaah!
text_block_list.name: Kraft & Cesario

text_block_list.text:
There was a roar of cheers. An announcment. 
But all of it seemed so far away. That's just 
how――impressed by Rhein Kraft and Cesario I was!

(Of course, every team wanted to scout them. Even the 
most 『Talented』 trainers in my year felt that way)
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
(Of course, every team wanted to scout them. Even the 
most 『Talented』 trainers in my year felt that way)
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Nice to meet you, Trainer-san! 
I'm Rhein Kraft!
text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft

text_block_list.text:
My name is Cesario. 
Thank you very much for coming to see this Selection race.
text_block_list.name: Cesario

text_block_list.text:
Um, the two of us will do our best! 
And――we want to join Team <Ascella>!
text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft

text_block_list.text:
Will you become our trainer? 
……I'm looking forward to working with you.
text_block_list.name: Cesario

text_block_list.text:
――I didn't expect both of them to approach me first, so I was 
really surprised. I still wonder why they chose our team.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
But still, since they joined……I want to help 
them win. Since these two were already talented, 
I'll have to put in the effort to match.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
But still, since they joined……I want to help 
them win. Since these two were already talented, 
I'll have to put in the effort to match.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
True. ……And so, how do you feel about the results 
you've worked hard for? Kraft-san's 『Hanshin JF』, 
do you think she has a good chance of winning?
text_block_list.name: King Halo
choice_data_list: Yeah. I think we can win.
Yeah. I think we can win.

text_block_list.text:
She won her debut, and her major last month. And her training 
could almost be called perfect. I think we're fully prepared.
text_block_list.name: <username>
choice_data_list: <size=41>Her first G1. Hope she isn't nervous――</size>
<size=41>Her first G1. Hope she isn't nervous――</size>

text_block_list.text:
Don't you think she's fine? She was sleeping 
so soundly in the car. She's surprisingly 
resilient……she might even be one of the strongest.
text_block_list.name: King Halo

text_block_list.text:
She might be. This is a race where the top class Junior 
Uma Musume gather but……if it's Rhein Kraft then――!
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
She might be. This is a race where the top class Junior 
Uma Musume gather but……if it's Rhein Kraft then――!
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
After the long journey, and a short night――it was finally time. 
The day of Rhein Kraft's 『Hanshin JF』……

Suuu……――Huuuu. 
……Yeah, alright!
text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft

text_block_list.text:
Yes! Trainer-san, just watch me. 
I'll definitely win.
text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft

text_block_list.text:
I'll prove it right here! 
That I'm worthy of being on your team.
text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft

text_block_list.text:
Kraft……yeah. 
On this G1 stage, go show them your full strength!
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Kraft……yeah. 
On this G1 stage, go show them your full strength!
text_block_list.name: <username>
